body_html:
A related post about the problem in StackOverflow:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/41543774/invalidargumenterror-for-tensor-bool-tensorflow-0-12-1

It seems that the boolean placeholder is not correctly initialized.
After using

sess.run(init, {isTrain: True})

The minimal example works fine.
body_text:
A related post about the problem in StackOverflow:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/41543774/invalidargumenterror-for-tensor-bool-tensorflow-0-12-1

After using

body:
A related post about the problem in StackOverflow:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/41543774/invalidargumenterror-for-tensor-bool-tensorflow-0-12-1

It seems that the boolean placeholder is not correctly initialized. 
After using
```python
sess.run(init, {isTrain: True})
```

The minimal example works fine.
